title: Air-Fryer Asparagus
full_text:
Air-Fryer Asparagus
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
10 mins
Total
15 mins
Serves
4
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
pound
(
450
g
)
asparagus
, trimmed (see note)
2
teaspoons
extra-virgin olive oil
1/4
teaspoon
kosher salt
1/8
teaspoon
freshly
ground black pepper
Directions
Set air fryer to 400°F (205°C) and preheat for 5 minutes.
Serious Eats / Jen Causey
In a bowl, toss asparagus with oil, salt, and pepper. Working in batches if necessary, transfer asparagus to basket in a single layer, and cook until asparagus is browned in a few spots and tender-crisp, 5 to 10 minutes (see notes).
Serious Eats / Jen Causey
Special Equipment
Air fryer
Notes
If asparagus is too long to fit in the air fryer, halve it crosswise.
I recommend using asparagus that is at least 1/2-inch thick. The cooking time may vary depending on the thickness of the asparagus
We recommend using a 6-quart or larger air fryer. If using a smaller air fryer, you may need to cook the asparagus in batches to ensure even cooking and spacing.
